name: Kurisarimon
effect: [When Digivolving] If you don't have an [Arata Sanada] card in play, you may play one from your hand without paying its memory cost.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] All of your other Digimon with the same name as this Digimon gain ＜Rush＞. (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play.)
